com.netflix.genie.common.internal.dtos

Interface DirectoryManifest.Filter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegexDirectoryManifestFilter
    Enclosing class:
    DirectoryManifest

    public static interface DirectoryManifest.Filter
    This interface defines a filter function used during creation of the manifest. It can prune entire sub-trees of the directory, optionally including the directory itself, or skip individual files. The default implementation accepts all entries and filters none.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean includeDirectory(java.nio.file.Path dirPath, java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
      Whether to include a given directory in the manifest.
      default boolean includeFile(java.nio.file.Path filePath, java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
      Whether to include a given file in the manifest.
      default boolean walkDirectory(java.nio.file.Path dirPath, java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
      Whether to recurse into a given directory and add its contents to the manifest.

    • Method Detail

      • includeFile

        default boolean includeFile(java.nio.file.Path filePath,
                            java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
        Whether to include a given file in the manifest.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path
        attrs - the file attributes
        Returns:
        true if the file should be included in the manifest, false if it should be excluded.

      • includeDirectory

        default boolean includeDirectory(java.nio.file.Path dirPath,
                                 java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
        Whether to include a given directory in the manifest. If a directory is not included, all sub-directories and files contained are also implicitly excluded.
        Parameters:
        dirPath - the directory path
        attrs - the directory attributes
        Returns:
        true if the directory should be included in the manifest, false if it should be excluded.

      • walkDirectory

        default boolean walkDirectory(java.nio.file.Path dirPath,
                              java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
        Whether to recurse into a given directory and add its contents to the manifest. Only evaluated if the directory is not excluded.
        Parameters:
        dirPath - the directory path
        attrs - the directory attributes
        Returns:
        true if the contents of the directory should be included in the manifest, false if they should be excluded.
